title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset. As per the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation in this case.
EB: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set. To reproduce the issue, add a table report item without setting the dataset and try creating a new table group. The user should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Create a new table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Observe if the group dialog is displayed.
